statements.sql: SELECT (IFNULL(SUM(detallecuota.monto),0) + 50)as monto FROM cuotas,plandepago,venta,detallecuota WHERE detallecuota.idCuota=cuotas.id and cuotas.idPlandePago=plandepago.id and plandepago.idVenta=venta.id and plandepago.idVenta=5
SELECT SUM(cuotas.monto)as cuota from cuotas,plandepago,venta WHERE cuotas.idPlandePago=plandepago.id and plandepago.idVenta=venta.id and  plandepago.idVenta=5
SELECT *from  cuotas,plandepago,venta WHERE cuotas.idPlandePago=plandepago.id and plandepago.idVenta=venta.id and  plandepago.idVenta=5 LIMIT 1

params.hints:
Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

statements.sql: SELECT cuotas.id,cuotas.monto from cuotas,plandepago,venta WHERE cuotas.estado='d' AND cuotas.idPlandePago=plandepago.id and plandepago.idVenta=venta.id and plandepago.idVenta=5
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(detallecuota.monto),0)as monto FROM detallecuota WHERE detallecuota.idCuota=4

params.hints:
Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

statements.sql: SELECT plandepago.id FROM plandepago,venta WHERE plandepago.idVenta=venta.id and plandepago.idVenta=5

params.hints:
Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan
